Text:
Please, pay attention that this movie is in RUSSIAN language.

I'm sorry for misleading name. I downloaded this file long ago and retained its name. Russian voice is recorded over english one there.

I wanted to transfer this file to my sister (she lives far away). And I didn't think it will be interesting for someone else.

I'm sorry for misleading once more.
I've been looking for this movie for awhile; Russian dubbing is fine with me. Thanks for sharing it! Please, keep seeding.
